## manually copy-pasted from: https://beta.ruff.rs/docs/rules/#ruff-specific-rules-ruf
# still waiting for this: https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/issues/1773
Code 	Name 	Message

UP025 	unicode-kind-prefix 	Remove unicode literals from strings 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP026 	deprecated-mock-import 	mock is deprecated, use unittest.mock 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP027 	unpacked-list-comprehension 	Replace unpacked list comprehension with a generator expression 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP028 	yield-in-for-loop 	Replace yield over for loop with yield from 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP029 	unnecessary-builtin-import 	Unnecessary builtin import: {import} 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP030 	format-literals 	Use implicit references for positional format fields 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP031 	printf-string-formatting 	Use format specifiers instead of percent format 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP032 	f-string 	Use f-string instead of format call 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP033 	lru-cache-with-maxsize-none 	Use @functools.cache instead of @functools.lru_cache(maxsize=None) 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP034 	extraneous-parentheses 	Avoid extraneous parentheses 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP035 	deprecated-import 	Import from {target} instead: 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP036 	outdated-version-block 	Version block is outdated for minimum Python version 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP037 	quoted-annotation 	Remove quotes from type annotation 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP038 	non-pep604-isinstance 	Use X | Y in {} call instead of (X, Y) 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP039 	unnecessary-class-parentheses 	Unnecessary parentheses after class definition 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
UP040 	non-pep695-type-alias 	Type alias {name} uses TypeAlias annotation instead of the type keyword 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª

flake8-datetimez (DTZ)#

For more, see flake8-datetimez on PyPI.
Code 	Name 	Message 	
DTZ001 	call-datetime-without-tzinfo 	The use of datetime.datetime() without tzinfo argument is not allowed 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DTZ002 	call-datetime-today 	The use of datetime.datetime.today() is not allowed, use datetime.datetime.now(tz=) instead 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DTZ003 	call-datetime-utcnow 	The use of datetime.datetime.utcnow() is not allowed, use datetime.datetime.now(tz=) instead 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DTZ004 	call-datetime-utcfromtimestamp 	The use of datetime.datetime.utcfromtimestamp() is not allowed, use datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(ts, tz=) instead 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DTZ005 	call-datetime-now-without-tzinfo 	The use of datetime.datetime.now() without tz argument is not allowed 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DTZ006 	call-datetime-fromtimestamp 	The use of datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp() without tz argument is not allowed 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DTZ007 	call-datetime-strptime-without-zone 	The use of datetime.datetime.strptime() without %z must be followed by .replace(tzinfo=) or .astimezone() 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DTZ011 	call-date-today 	The use of datetime.date.today() is not allowed, use datetime.datetime.now(tz=).date() instead 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DTZ012 	call-date-fromtimestamp 	The use of datetime.date.fromtimestamp() is not allowed, use datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(ts, tz=).date() instead 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª

DJ006 	django-exclude-with-model-form 	Do not use exclude with ModelForm, use fields instead 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª

DJ008 	django-model-without-dunder-str 	Model does not define __str__ method 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DJ012 	django-unordered-body-content-in-model 	Order of model's inner classes, methods, and fields does not follow the Django Style Guide: {element_type} should come before 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
DJ013 	django-non-leading-receiver-decorator 	@receiver decorator must be on top of all the other decorators 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª

RUF010 	explicit-f-string-type-conversion 	Use explicit conversion flag 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
RUF011 	static-key-dict-comprehension 	Dictionary comprehension uses static key: {key} 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
RUF012 	mutable-class-default 	Mutable class attributes should be annotated with typing.ClassVar 	ğŸ› ï¸ ğŸ§ª
